ygData.subject: Re: Vampiric embrace or lifetap?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I would guess teh damage is based on our level being 8 levels lower than the necro using it.  Rememeber, since we got spells at 9th, our effective level in
ygData.messageBody:
Princess Xaera wrote:
>
> From: "Princess Xaera" <xaera@...>
>
> Just as a quick note, the Necro and SK VE are the same spell but do totally
> different damage. The question is: Why? It should work the same for both
> classes. I don't see a Rangers heal do less then half of a druids. Or a
> paladians heal do half of a clerics for the same spell. If the spell is
> going to act differently should have a different name.
>

I would guess teh damage is based on our level being 8 levels lower
than the necro using it. Rememeber, since we got spells at 9th, our
effective level in casting (and for mana) is 8 levels lower. My VE
is getting better at about 1HP / 2 levels I think.

Xilith
